translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns .🔽The Three-Fives Collection
Ubbiri, you should take care of yourself.
They’ve been burned in this great fire.
Which of them do you grieve for?”
the dart that was hard to see in the heart.
Because of my grief for my daughter,
you removed my grief for my daughter.
Today the dart has been pulled out,
I’m free from thirst, and I’m fully extinguished.
I go for refuge to the Buddha, the Teaching, and the Sangha of monks,
to the best of the sages.”
